just use this :)



if:
z1 = a + bi
z2 = c + di
z1^z2 = g + ki

( a=/=0 )

then:

g = (a^2 + b^2)^(c/2) * cos(d * ln(a^2 + b^2) / 2 + c * arctan(b/a) + 2cπn) / e^(d * arctan(b / a) + 2dπn)

k = (a^2 + b^2)^(c/2) * sin(d * ln(a^2 + b^2) / 2 + c * arctan(b/a) + 2cπn) / e^(d * arctan(b / a) + 2dπn)

were n could be any integer

( when a = 0 use π/2 = arctan(b/a) )
